thread.title: Susan Patricia Wing Wong-Howell
thread.title_full: TrustedHousesitters reviewed by Susan Patricia Wing Wong-Howell

author: Susan Patricia Wing Wong-Howell
title: Susan Patricia Wing Wong-Howell
text: I have just subscribed and used trustedhousesitters for the first time and i couldn't be happier. While i was away my sitter, who was amazing and very friendly, kept in touch with me and sent me photo's of my two dogs. I came home to a very clean house, clean bedding on my bed and most importantly two very happy and well cared for dogs. From this experience i would highly recommend trustedhousesitters
